Package cz.cvut.felk.cig.jcop.problem

Package contains interfaces and classes required to define new problems.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ConfigurationMap ConfigurationMap is used if problem requires attributes attributes different type than Integer.
DestinationProblem DestinationProblem has one or more `destination` configurations which are considered solution of a problem, eg. if you are able to find your way to such attributes, you have solution to that problem.
Fitness Fitness is used to give an attributes' quality a numeric value.
GlobalSearchProblem This interface allows usage of global search algorithms such as genetic algorithm or ant colony.
ObjectiveProblem Objective problem groups all problem interfaces into one and adds methods to determine if an implementation has these interfaces really implemented or just they throw an exception if interface's method is called.
Operation Operation is transformation of one attributes to another.
OperationIterator Lazy iterator over operations in problem.
Problem Most basic problem interface - every problem must implement this.
RandomConfigurationProblem Problem implementing RandomConfigurationProblem is able to return random configurations.
ReversibleOperation This interface provides means for operation that have reverse - eg. it is possible to negate effect of one operation using its reverse.
StartingConfigurationProblem Problem implementing StartingConfigurationProblem is one where there is always possible to find one starting attributes.
 

Class Summary
BaseFitness Provides basic methods for computing common fitness operations.
BaseObjectiveProblem This class should be base for all problems (at least local search problems) implemented.
BaseProblem Implements some methods of Problem identical for most problems.
BaseReversibleOperation Base implementation of ReversibleOperation interface.
Configuration Configuration is representation of one state in state space.
IdentityConfigurationMap Default mapping for configurations, used if no other is explicitly specified.
NewConfigurationOperation This is dummy operation used mostly for OperationHistory to indicate that new attributes was created (either by RandomConfigurationProblem or StartingConfigurationProblem.
OperationHistory Operation history is used to record which operations in which order were applied to get operation.
UnknownOperation Creates new UnknownOperation for OperationHistory.
 

Exception Summary
InvalidConfigurationException Thrown when operation is used on configuration which it is unable to modify.
ProblemFormatException Thrown for invalid format to initialize problem from, for example file has invalid number of columns.
ProblemNotFoundException Thrown when problem is not found, for example loading from empty file.
 

Package cz.cvut.felk.cig.jcop.problem Description

Package contains interfaces and classes required to define new problems. Subpackages contains implementations of some basic problems, such as SAT, bucket, knapsack, TSP.
